ygData.subject: RE: Divine aura or divine barrier
ygData.msgSnippet: The worst part about Divine Barrier is that it takes longer to cast!  I died the other day because I could not get Divine Barrier off, since then I have
ygData.messageBody:
The worst part about Divine Barrier is that it takes longer to cast! I died
the other day because I could not get Divine Barrier off, since then I have
swapped it for Divine Aura and have no problems.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro


> From: Woland Grauensturm <woland@...>
>
>
> I just reached level 29 and tested divine barrier. I am a bit
> disappointed.
> I noticed that divine barrier lasts for around 22 secs while divine aura
> lasts for some 20 secs. Divine barrier also restores some HPs, I was
> standing and noticed around 50 hit points regenerated.
>
> But 100 mana!?! That is a lot of mana in an emergency. Can the
> rest of you
> clerics please give me advice. What do you prefer to use after level 29?
>
> // JS
